summary: This line chart has an x axis representing year and a y axis representing research and development expenditure, with a total of 25 data points. The chart has 3 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely positive which exists from 1990 to 2008.
Additionally, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2009 to 2011.
Likewise, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2012 to 2014.
